name: Grand Hotel La Favorita

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled with friends
reviews.text: If you get a chance to stay at this hotel...consider yourself lucky! Not only will you be amazed at the beautiful view and location, each and every person working for the hotel will treat you special. We felt like we were important to them and our every need or request was met happily. They assisted us with phone calls and language barriers, upgraded our room upon arrival (book early), and seemed they knew what we needed before we did. Exceptional Service!
reviews.title: Special Staff in an Exceptional Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have never seen such a clean and well taken care of hotel. The breakfast was delightful and plenty of choices. The pool was so beautiful.
reviews.title: A Grand holiday in a very Grand hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled with friends
reviews.text: You will love it there....Enjoy the special treatment at a great cost!!
reviews.title: THE ABOLUTE BEST

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hamilton, Ontario...Canada
reviews.title: Beautiful hotel with outstanding manager!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled with family
reviews.text: The Grand Hotel La Favorita
reviews.title: Fabulous place to stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: When arriving by train, we were tired and asked a cab driver how much to the hotel. He said 15 euro's, which was crazy. It's about a 12 minute walk and lets you pass through downtown area. Upon arrival, efforts to speak italian are thwarted by English speakers. They really make you feel welcome. We used this as a jump off to visit Pompei and the Almafi coast, which are both incredible.
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We enjoyed the views from the rooftop pool, and while cold and rainy, still made for good pictures. The small alleyways near the hotel make for great walks and there's alot of shopping.
reviews.title: Loved the tile floor!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Our electric adaptor did not work and a simple call downstairs got us a new one to borrow. At one point, I wanted to confirm a train reservation and the night desk man let me use the internet to check on it. They are very accomodating.
reviews.title: Italian elegance and charm!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled with family
reviews.text: The rooms are nice and have automatic blinds, which helps for taking mid-day naps. It seemed the maid came in 2x daily, which was a bit weird to know they were in your room so often. We would leave for dinner at 6pm and come back at 8:30 and the beds were remaid, but I guess you can't complain about that. Breakfast was also very good and alot of selection.
reviews.title: Stylish, classy and fantastic!!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled with family
reviews.text: The only negative, and this was small, was that we asked for a wake-up call the last day and we never got it. Luckily, we were up already and it did not matter. They have a bar, but no one uses it, I suggest a meet and greet or happy hour to get guests socializing with each other.
reviews.title: Gem of a Hotel!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for 2 nights. Wish it had been longer. Beautiful new hotel in great location in Sorrento. Rooftop pool overlooks the Bay of Naples and Mt. Vesuvius. Lobby is stunning, service was great. Two things, beds were extremely firm, not my personal favorite, but the rooms were spotless and there was both a shower and soaker tub in the bathroom. NICE!!
reviews.title: Beautiful Hotel in Sorrento

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The other thing was the hotel bar. White makes a wonderful fashion statement, but it did have a sort of "sterile" appearance. Not really a cozy spot for a drink.
reviews.title: Beautiful hotel in fabulous location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled with friends
reviews.text: That said, we would still stay here again in a heartbeat.
reviews.title: This hotel is a beautiful gem.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled with family
reviews.text: As soon as me and my fiancee saw the pictures of the hotel, we knew it was the one for us and the reality was not a disappointment. From the stunning reception to the beutiful bar, the fabulous roof top pool overlooking the Bay of Naples and Vesuvius, the spacious tiled room and the courteous and helpful staff. On top of that being a stones throw from the old town was a fantastic bonus. We loved every minute.
reviews.title: Beautiful Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010
reviews.text: We were delighted with the beautiy of this newly renovated hotel. It is located within walking distance of everything. The view from the rooftop pool and lounge area is breathtaking. The room and bath were elegant and supplied with all one would need.
reviews.title: Stunning Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a brand new hotel, opened only 2 months before our arrival. The lobby and the general facilities were superb. The room extremely confortable and well appointed it even had an electric curtain that made the room very quiet and dark.
reviews.title: Fantastic value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The breakfast(included in the rate) was fantastic and the desk clercs were very helpful.
reviews.title: Good and renovated hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The location is great, about 3 blocks from the center of town.
reviews.title: My Favorite!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rates were very reasonable tor the area, and the manager gave us an upgrade without us asking for it. In general, this is most definetely a 5 star hotel, not the 4 that ii is rated now.
reviews.title: Best part of staying in Sorrento

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled solo
reviews.text: We spent three nights in Sorrento, which is a lively city with fair prices. But be aware that the surroundings are dirty!
reviews.title: Fantastic and beautiful

description: The Grand Hotel La Favorita is a new recently inaugurated hotel surrounded by lush Mediterranean gardens. A hidden gem situated in the heart of historical centre yet only a few steps away from the most stunning terraces of Sorrento wich offer a spectacular view of the bay of Naples and Sorrentine Peninsular.The Hotel'scomforts structure and professional staff, will ensure our guests a most enjoyable and rememberable stay.
